alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 9:50AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches, with up to 18 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect bands. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. with up to 18 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect bands. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
